Text.Page:
The fight goes on, . We need you!

Engage the naga survivors guarding the Chamber of Mighty Souls, including {@LinkCreature:42#220#naga zealots}, {@LinkCreature:42#230#Dagonite templars}, {@LinkCreature:42#320#naga fighters}, {@LinkCreature:42#1010#mekonari zealots}, and {@LinkCreature:42#1020#mekonari bloodletters}.

Speak with {@LinkCreature:75#1016#Glasrinne} in Frontera when your mission's complete.
The nagas are weaker, thanks to you. But there's still a lot to do, and I hope you'll stick around to help out.
I never said it'd be easy, but what you're doing is helping us stay alive and do what we came here to do. Don't stop now.
